Get the beta on this cydia repo: http://vladkorotnev.dyndns.org/betarepo/

item.title: [5.0 beta] OverheatMe - Keep your annoying friends away of your phone
item.dc:creator: vladkorotnev@gmail.com
item.dc:subject: Welcome
item.content:encoded:
Have you ever been annoyed by your friends asking «May I play around with your iPhone?»
The reasons you don’t want to give it to ‘em may be different, but you need to make up an excuse for this.
Now you don’t!
This widget, when you tap it, displays a REAL overheat UI!
So, picture that:
An annoying friend walks to you and asks: «May I play %iGameName% on your iPhone?»
You tap the button fast and say: «It’s overheated and needs some time to cool down»
Friend: «Ah, I see...» /walks away/
You tap the screen and unlock the phone as usual:


Done!

item.title: An evil joke for iOS users
item.dc:creator: vladkorotnev@gmail.com
item.dc:subject: Welcome
item.content:encoded:
EvilJoke — will hide SpringBoard icons when user taps them.
DISCLAIMER: I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANYTHING THAT MAY HAPPEN IF YOU USE THIS SOFTWARE.
IT IS FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY. USE SAFE MODE VIA SBSETTINGS TO REMOVE!

Screenshot under the break

item.title: New: iStartupSound and BlackScreenshot
item.dc:creator: vladkorotnev@gmail.com
item.dc:subject: Welcome
item.content:encoded:
BlackScreenshot makes your iOS screenshot flash black, looks better than white :). Get here.

iStartupSound lets your iDevice have a startup sound. Get here. Sample startup.wav here. iStartupSound was featured on ModMyi.

item.title: Current iPhone software list
item.dc:creator: vladkorotnev@gmail.com
item.dc:subject: Welcome
item.content:encoded:
So, here’s a list of all iPhone software that I made (open source of course):

  • iPhoneNPI, a Newton Package Installer for the iPhone. Grab here.
  • iOS Deactivator. Deactivates iOS devices (Mac only). Grab here.
  • A fork of libluckycharms by Gojohnnyboi, with AFC functions. Grab here.
More to come :)
